name: Heartbreak
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You forcibly end the charmed condition on all creatures that can see you and are charmed by you, dealing grievous injuries to their psyche. Choose one of the following effects for each affected creature:
>Their maximum hit points are set to their current hit points.
>They lose one-quarter of their current hit points.
>They enter a berserk rage for 1 minute and can do nothing but attack the closest creature.
>They fall into a near-unconscious state and can't take any actions for 1 minute.

A creature affected by the latter two effects can make an Intuition saving throw at the end of each of their turns to end the effect early on a success.
